title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout in Build 2002071610021.
OB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row is deleted. However, instead of staying on the second row, the Launch item is moved to the first row.
EB: After pressing the Delete button, the Launch item should stay on the second row.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Press the Delete button.
3. Observe that the first item on the second row is deleted.
4. Verify that the Launch item remains on the second row.
